b'Mina no Mura no Gomi Soudou': b"Mina's family has a baby goat, but it dies from eating a plastic bag left in the paddy field. Some children are absent from school due to health problems caused by waste. So, the villagers have a meeting to discuss what they can do to improve waste management.\n\n(Source: ACCU)"
[b'Mina no Mura to Mori', b'Mina no Bousai Mura Dzukuri']
